yaml.title: Orebit Geological Solutions
yaml.subtitle: Professional R Shiny Applications for Modern Geology
yaml.description: Advanced geological analysis suite - GeoDataViz, Resource Estimation, and Pit Optimization tools for professional geoscientists and mining engineers.

markdown.markdown:
:::: hero-Orebit

Advanced Geological Analysis Suite

From Exploration to Production

Professional R Shiny applications for geological data analysis, resource estimation, and mine optimization.

::: hero-buttons Try GeoDataViz Now Learn More ::: :::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ :::::: products-grid ::: {.product-card .flagship} ### GeoDataViz **Available Now - Free Demo**

Transform your geological workflow with professional-grade exploratory data analysis and visualization. Built specifically for geological datasets, GeoDataViz revolutionizes how geoscientists understand their data.

**Key Features:** - Interactive 3D geological visualization - Advanced statistical analysis for geological data - Comprehensive QA/QC validation tools - Professional reporting capabilities Launch Demo → ::: ::: {.product-card .upcoming} ### Resource Estimation App **Coming Q2 2026**

Professional geostatistical analysis and resource modeling in your browser. Advanced kriging algorithms, variogram modeling, and uncertainty quantification tools.

**Planned Features:** - Automated variogram modeling - Advanced kriging techniques - Resource classification tools - Industry-standard reporting Join Beta List → ::: ::: {.product-card .upcoming} ### Pit Optimizer **Coming Q3 2026**

Sophisticated mine planning and pit optimization algorithms. Maximize NPV while considering operational constraints and environmental factors.

**Planned Features:** - Multi-criteria optimization - Operational constraint modeling - Environmental impact assessment - Economic scenario planning Get Notified → ::: ::::::
